channel.title: Source game multiplayer problem
channel.description: Whenever I try to connect to my buddy on GMOD or Synergy, I keep getting a message his server isn't responding, and vice versa. Does anyone have a fix for this?

item.title: Source game multiplayer problem
item.dc:creator: FERGUS
item.description:
Probably because the IP to his server appears to be his local IP in the server browser. Let him use https://www.whatismyip.com/ to find out his ip, add :27015(The default source server port, change it if he have) to the end. Then you connect through console with "connect [IP]:27015.

Read full topic
